verses.verse: Now <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H8334>minister,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H4191>dead;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> you, and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I do <S%H5414>give<s%> to them, even to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> that the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> on, that have I <S%H5414>given<s%> to you, as I <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

From the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> toward the <S%H3996>going<s%> <S%H3996>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> shall be your <S%H1366>coast.<s%>

There shall not any <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H3320>able<s%> to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life:<s%> as I was with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so I will be with you: I will not <S%H7503>fail<s%> you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> you.

Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage:<s%> for to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> shall you divide for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them.

<S%H7535>Only<s%> be you <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H553>courageous,<s%> that you may <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you: <S%H5493>turn<s%> not from it to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> that you may <S%H7919>prosper<s%> <S%H3605>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H3212>go.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> but you shall <S%H1897>meditate<s%> therein <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> that you may <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> therein: for <S%H227>then<s%> you shall make your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous,<s%> and <S%H227>then<s%> you shall have good <S%H7919>success.<s%>

Have not I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you? Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage;<s%> be not <S%H6206>afraid,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be you <S%H2865>dismayed:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is with you <S%H3605>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H3212>go.<s%>

<S%H5674>Pass<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the <S%H4264>host,<s%> and <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3559>Prepare<s%> you <S%H6720>victuals;<s%> for <S%H5750>within<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

And to the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and to <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given you <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and has <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

Your <S%H802>wives,<s%> your <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, and your <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> but you shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H2571>armed,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and <S%H5826>help<s%> them;

<S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have given your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H5117>rest,<s%> as he has given you, and they <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> them: then you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H3425>possession,<s%> and <S%H3423>enjoy<s%> it, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the sun <S%H4217>rise.<s%> <S%H8121><s%>

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> that you <S%H6680>command<s%> us we will <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H413>wherever<s%> you <S%H7971>send<s%> us, we will <S%H3212>go.<s%>

According as we <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> things, <S%H3651>so<s%> will we <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you: <S%H7535>only<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> be with you, as he was with <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he be that does <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against your <S%H6310>commandment,<s%> and will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H1697>words<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H6680>command<s%> him, he shall be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage.<s%>
